h4.ProjectileResetExpirations (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_ProjectileResetExpirations_GameServerLib]
*No Return*
Resets all things that would expire the projectile, like range and lifetime


h4.ProjectileResetHitEntities (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_ProjectileResetHitEntities_GameServerLib]
*No Return*
Resets the list of entities hit by the projectile and allows the projectile to hit them again
